name: Magic Mart
description:
A lot of weird things happen here. But none of these seem to face you as you are from Australia.

Story

You own a little interdimensional shop in which you prepare the most different dishes for all your customers like Pixel cupcakes or even Hell on Earth Cocktails. No matter what your customers wish for though, you will hand them their delicious treat or potion.

Gameplay

Make yourself at home at your very own mart. Buy ingredients and unlock new recipes by fullfilling all sorts of quest and shenanigans. You are what makes these recipes come together!

Meet the characters

On your journey you will meet loads of new characters such as...

Claw & Mr.Wiggles Steve Nyx

...and many more side characters.

Credits:
